metadata.creator: Jose Veloso Abueva
metadata.description: A portion of the book’s abstract reads: “The American legacy in the Philippines rests upon an indigenous Filipino culture--a humane social tradition with a respect for powerful leadership--and the influence of authoritarian Spanish rule for over 300 years that nevertheless introduced the values of Christianity.”
metadata.subject: Filipino
metadata.title: Filipino Democracy And The American Legacy
metadata.subject: American
